channel.title: My first EVER sig's
channel.description:
ok v1 of it:
[IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/fordgt00.jpg[/img]
v2 of it:
[IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/fordgt01.jpg[/img]
v3 of it :
[IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/fordgt02.jpg[/img]
please say which one is the best and please rate each out of 10
EXAMPLE:
[QUOTE=someone]yeah v1 its pretty simple design but great for first sig i can see you getting better keep it up mate ;) Rate:7/10 for first sig :d[/QUOTE]

item.title: My first EVER sig's
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

These aren’t your first…

Read some tutorials, try and find a style, then expand.

Read full topic

item.title: My first EVER sig's
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

exe626:

These aren’t your first, you use to have a post where you made them for people.

Oh, well in that case, you officially fail for saying these are your first so people won’t be so harsh on you and give you a bad rating.

Read full topic

These aren’t your first, you use to have a post where you made them for people.

pretty simple i guess 3/10

item.title: My first EVER sig's
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:2, topic:148173”]Only v1 is good, the rest suck, also so does the text. The other 2 are only different by the fact you you applied a filter to each 1.
2/10, read some tutorials.[/quote]

Bit harsh but I’m gonna agree there. Although I’d say 4/10 instead of 2/10.

Read full topic

item.title: My first EVER sig's
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

TBH its a crap render with no depth and its just straight and boring. Better than othe rpeople first signatures but still kind of crap.

Follow tutorials before posting!

Read full topic

item.title: My first EVER sig's
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“pk3r kyle, post:5, topic:148173”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=203054.msg1793594#msg1793594 date=1191271588]

[QUOTE=someone]yeah v1 its pretty simple design but great for first sig i can see you getting better keep it up mate
Rate:7/10 for first sig :d[/QUOTE]

Wow… You kissed your own ass…
[/quote]

lol -.- thats a quote from makam off rune-server[/quote]

Well, anyway, v1 is probably the best, although none are very special tbh. Fix the text and try finding a better render, that one looks pixelated.

Read full topic
